name: Airtame
notes: The number of screens is based on 10,000 organizations using Airtame

name: Dise
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Displ
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided connected locations. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Drip Boards
notes: You must have an active PosterMyWall subscription to use the Drip Boards Free Starter Subscription

name: DST Connect
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Eggs TV
notes: There is no pricing per screen, only per location, so we are not mentioning plans because it can be extremely expensive or ultra cheap depending on the number of screens in a location.

name: Engage IoT
notes: Software for kiosk management

name: Enplug
notes: Spectrio acquired Enplug in 2021.

name: Fijee
notes: Formerly known as Phygital Signage (phygitalsignage.io)

name: Firstouch
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Foyer
notes: Digital Signage for WordPress.

plans.name: Flexible Subscription License for one Player

name: Fyresign
notes: Formerly known as SocialScreen

name: Garlic Player
notes: You need to build your own CMS to connect this player, or use it with a SmilControl CMS.

name: iiSignage
notes: To work with iiSignage the PC or notebook needs to be connected to the same (LAN/WiFi) network as the displays.
There is also iiSignage², which is cloud-based.

name: ANIMA INFINITYS
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: INNES
notes: Had 40,000 screens in 2024

name: ITEQ Digital
notes: The total number of screens is based on the number daily broadcast spots

name: Kitcast
notes: Digital Signage Software for Apple TV. Platforms planned for 2025: Android, Fire OS, BrightSign, Tizen, webOS, macOS

name: Liqvid
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: LocalScreens
notes: Helloscreens whitelabel solution.

name: Magic Mirror
notes: Software only comes in a package with a hardware as well.

name: Mango Display
notes: The screen count is based on the number of subscribers. The actual screen count may vary.

name: MangoSigns
notes: 20% discounts for non-profit organizations, educational institutions or places of worship.

name: MEDI+SIGN
notes: Healthcare platform offering digital patient whiteboards & door displays.

name: MoogX
notes: Digital signage for menu boards

name: MustHaveMenus
notes: The total number of screens is based on the number of restaurants

name: Mvix
notes: Perpetual license of hardware and/or software starting at $350 - no ongoing fees or monthly subsciption

name: Nanonation Commandpoint
notes: The total number of screens is based on terminals deployed globally as dislosed.

name: nento
notes: webOS and Tizen are planned to be added

name: Newvision
notes: The total number of screens is based on the number of sites installed. The actual number may vary.

name: Nonius
notes: Digital signage solution for hotels.

name: NowSignage
notes: The screen count is based on the number of customers. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Nutrislice
notes: Empowering over 30,000 locations around the world

name: Pickcel
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided connected locations. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Pictor
notes: Two purchase methods: subscription and one-time license payment that includes 1 year remote management

name: piSignage
notes: A player license is required for open-source server usage, though subscription charges are waived if opting for an open-source server.

name: Posterbooking
notes: We mention a minimum of 35000 connected screens based on customer count, but the actual number could be significantly higher.

name: PublicView
notes: One time start-up fee of $109.9 is not included in the subcription price.

name: Q-play
notes: The screen count is based on the number of customers. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Creative Realities Reflect AdLogic
notes: Digital advertising solution designed specifically for the unique needs of the place-based and out-of-home markets.

name: Ryarc CampaignManager
notes: A single platform for managing digital signage, audio, and sensors.

name: Screen Canvas
notes: Digital signage software for Apple TV with no subscription

name: Screenfeed
notes: Not fully digital signage software, but a content provider. Can be used in conjunction with other software.

name: Screensoft
notes: Video demo of the software is available.

name: signage.ninja
notes: By TRISON

name: SignCast
notes: Seems like NoviSign white-label

name: Sippo
notes: Digital Menu Boards

name: SiteKiosk
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided customer count. The actual screen count may vary.

name: SkyMedia
notes: One-time charge without subscription.

name: Smartsign
notes: The first release notes are available from 2020

name: SmilControl
notes: A CMS that can be used with the open-source digital signage player Garlic Player

name: Spectrio
notes: Total screens number based on global locations powered provided

name: StratosMedia
notes: StratosMedia also delivers its proprietary Operating System – StratosOS which can be loaded on any x86-64 hardware to create a StratosMedia playback device.

name: SureVideo
notes: a digital signage kiosk solution

name: TCadvert
notes: IMS has over 4300 digital signage screens installed according to their website; however, not all of them are using their TCadvert software.

name: Tippler TV
notes: Still WIP, Tizen to be added

name: TrilbyTV
notes: Digital signage for schools mainly, but also offers options per screen for Charity, Voluntary organisation, or Business.

name: truDigital
notes: Total screens is based on the number of active users

name: Uniguest Hub
notes: An all-in-one solution for digital signage, interactive TV, casting, room signage, and interactive wayfinding.

name: Uniguest MediaStar
notes: MediaStar Systems acquired by Uniguest in November 2022, originally founded in the UK.

name: Uniguest Otrum
notes: Norwegian hospitality platform acquired by Uniguest in 2022.

name: Uniguest Tripleplay
notes: IPTV, digital signage, and video streaming software and technology.

name: UPshow
notes: Acquired by EverPass Media

name: Valotalive
notes: Screen count is based on revenue.

name: VisuScreen
notes: Video tutorial is available on the website.

name: Vivi
notes: Total sceens number based on the number of classrooms provided

name: Waapiti
notes: Total screens number is based on the number of the worldwide locations

name: Wauly
notes: The total number of screens is based on the number of licenses

name: Xibo
notes: Android, Tizen and webOS players are closed-source, commercial products and require a (perpetual) license if used with a free self-hosted server.
The Tizen player is currently limited to HD resolution on 4K screens.
